text: Tim Trummer (born 10 November 2005 in Feldbach) is an Austrian football player. He plays as midfielder for the Second league club FC Liefering. ==Career == Trummer began his career at SC Fürstenfeld. In 2016–17 he was in the JAZ GU-Süd (Jugendausbildungszentrum Graz-Umgebung-Süd- Youth training center Graz-Surroundings-South). For the 2018–19 season he switched to FC Red Bull Salzburg. He went through all age groups in the academy from the 2019–20 season. For the 2023–24 season he went to the squad of FC Liefering FC Liefering Homepage He made his debut in the second division in July 2023 when he was in the starting eleven against FC Dornbirn 1913 on the first day of that season. FC Salzburg Wiki In January 2025 he received a professional contract with Salzburg that runs until 2028. FC Red Bull Salzburg In February 2025 he was in the Red Bull squad for the first time. On 22 February 2025 he made his debut in the Bundesliga against FK Austria Wien. ==National team == Trummer made his debut for Austria U-18 against Hungary on 18 October 2022. transfermarkt.at Trummer played his first match for Austria U21 on 21 March 2025. ==References== Category:2005 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Liefering players Category:Austrian football midfielders Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players
title: Tim Trummer
